a91-1.resolution: wq-386 completed in B#336 (s1167). Post-session hook 26-session-trace.sh now extracts engagement metrics (platforms, threads, topics, agents, skipped, intel_count) from engagement-trace.json and engagement-intel.json for E sessions and writes them to session-traces.jsonl.

a91-2.resolution: wq-387 completed in B#336 (s1167). getMaxQueueId() in session-context.mjs now scans both work-queue.json and work-queue-archive.json to find the true maximum ID. All auto-ingest paths (brainstorming, TODO followups, friction signals, intel promotions) use this function.
